data.name: Instant Farmer - Logic Puzzle
data.detailed_description:
Also recommended for you

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1716390/Floating_Farmer__Logic_Puzzle/?utm_source=steampage&utm_campaign=insf_page

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1564560/?utm_source=steampage&utm_campaign=insf_page

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1309130/Lucky_and_a_life_worth_living__a_jigsaw_puzzle_tale/


About the Game

A country life, growing a vegetable garden in your own ranch.
In this tiny fantasy countryside experience, that is easy to do and very relaxing.

Just keep in mind: water brings life.
Swap the blocks of earth, stone, water, and others, like water channels and lawn sprinklers, so that all the arable soil receives the necessary water. Solve the challenge and feel the pleasure of watching the plants instantly grow and bear fruit.

There is no time limit or resources to manage, so you can calmly just focus on the core mechanics while listening to a soothing soundtrack and animal sounds. Figuring out the patterns of blocks will make it easier to solve the puzzles.

As you progress solving the logic puzzles, see your farm expand and evolve in the background with new types of vegetables.

With clean skies, fresh air, and crystal clear water, among birds and listening to the sounds of nature.


Featuring:
  • 50 logic puzzles to complete.
  • An exclusive and immersive soundtrack.

data.short_description: Water the soil of your ranch and watch your crop grow. A relaxing logic puzzle game.
data.reviews:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
